hero.name: I'm Yuliia Gorgodze.
hero.textAboutMe: I'm probably the most passionate programmer you'll ever work with. If you have a great project that requires amazing skills, I'm with you.

experience.deu: Developed 20+ web applications using React and Next.js, improved user experience and performance by using tools like SWR for data retrieval and Redux for state management, and received positive feedback from customers. I worked with DEU for almost three years, from June 2020 to May 2023.
